title.narrative: Technical Assistance (Ta) Pooled Fund for Programme Consultancy Work.

description.narrative: This activity (Technical Assistance (Ta) Pooled Fund for Programme Consultancy Work.) is a component of Technical Assistance (Ta): Pooled Fund for Programme Consultancy Work. reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £636,433. This component benefits Tanzania, and works in the following sector(s): Research/scientific institutions. , with the following implementing partners: British Council, British High Commission Tanzania, Crown Agents Limited, DAI Europe, Overseas Development Institute, Wageningen University & Research - Stichting Wageningen Research. The start date is 21-04-2009 and the end date is 31-12-2011.

participating-org.narrative: Wageningen University & Research - Stichting Wageningen Research

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
